survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the career progression and satisfaction levels of university alumni to improve career services and alumni engagement programs.

questions.question_text: Which year did you graduate from the university?
questions.client_notes: Use a dropdown menu for better mobile responsiveness.

script.question_text: Which year did you graduate from the university?

questions.question_text: What is your current employment status?
answer_options: Not seeking employment (e.g., retired, further education)
questions.client_notes: Ensure options cover common employment scenarios.

script.question_text: What is your current employment status?
answer_options: Not seeking employment (e.g., retired, further education)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current career progression?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Employed full-time', 'Employed part-time', or 'Self-employed' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current career progression?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Employed full-time', 'Employed part-time', or 'Self-employed' in Q2

questions.question_text: Which university resources or services most contributed to your career success? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to capture varied experiences.

script.question_text: Which university resources or services most contributed to your career success? (Select all that apply)
